paragraphs: The desire to construct robust and portable natural language systems has led to research on how a core vocabulary for such systems can be defined. paragraphs: ()ur research on establishing a core vocabulary tor German in the framework of the I,I1,OG project Ires revealed that currently no absolute definition can be given, but ways have been shown how to arrive at a working dclinition with respect to the objectives of natural language systems. It has been shown that both statistical mclhods and semanlic criteria can, and I think, have to contribute to the establishment of a core vocabulary.
